overview: Mr. Urbas has over 13 years of serial success as an entrepreneur in industries ranging from entertainment, financial services, tax resolution and preparation, sport management, and consulting. His expertise is in the ability to build multi-million dollar companies from the ground up. His strengths include the knack of constructing, motivating, and implementing powerful marketing and sales plans. All of Mr. Urbasâ€™s companies have exceeded industry wide expectation levels for earnings and profits. His robust marketing and sales background have positioned him as a leader throughout his business ventures.
